page.title: 07SOCIAL LIFE
page.content: There are{thirteen pubs}in Usk and some are very old. The{Castle Inn}was built in the 11th century and was a quarter of the size it is now. When it was built it was a plain hut and inside it was dull and shabby. The{Innbetween}is a public house dating from the 17th century. There used to be a ghost who sat on the end of a bed. The{Cross Keys Inn has changed little since it was constructed, in the 16th century, and the interior still retains much of its original plaster ceiling and beams. The{Glan_yr_afon}is a magnificent gothic villa of 1868, and is now a hotel.The{Royal Hotel}was built about 18th century as a private house. It has a very fine shop front with its two bowed windows which make it look very pretty. Pubs are popular as{entertainment.}
